snippet: Amnet Ruenroeng of Thailand, the reigning International Boxing Federation flyweight champion, handed Zou Shiming, the two-time Olympic gold medalist for China, his first loss.
lead_paragraph: Amnet Ruenroeng of Thailand, the reigning International Boxing Federation flyweight champion, handed Zou Shiming, the two-time Olympic gold medalist for China, his first loss.

headline.main: Olympic Medalist Loses in Boxing Match
